name: Project 046
description:
EXPLORE. DISCOVER. REMEMBER. CHOOSE.

Project 046 is a psychological horror video game where the player explores an abandoned laboratory, discovering the past and the role they played in what happened. Will they further their research or decide to step away?

During the 2021-22 academic year, a senior capstone team of Emerging Media Arts students from the Johnny Carson Center (https://arts.unl.edu/carson-center) teamed up with a Senior Design team in the School of Computing (https://computing.unl.edu/) to collaborate on the design and production of a psychological horror video game titled "Project 046". This is the first interdisciplinary capstone collaboration between the School of Computing and the Carson Center.
